articles.author: Katie Balevic
articles.title: Daniel Penny, who choked a homeless man to death on the subway, says 'it's a little bit comical' because 'I love all people' - Yahoo News
articles.description: Daniel Penny said it's "comical" he's been accused of racism after killing Jordan Neely since he loves "all people" and was planning a trip to Africa.
articles.content:
Daniel Penny, who held a homeless man in a chokehold on a New York subway until his death, said the accusations against his character are "a little bit comical" because he loves "all people." 
In an… [+2062 chars]
